settings.title: Ten years warranty
settings.text:
The ten-year warranty covers the structural parts of the chair.
Ergo CORE B625-1: Five-star casters, chassis adjustment mechanism (cloth and sponge not included), back frame (mesh not included).
Ergo PRO A633-1: Five-star casters, chassis adjustment mechanism (without cloth and sponge), back frame (without mesh).
Ergo ART A643: Five-star casters, chassis adjustment mechanism (without cloth and sponge), back frame (without mesh).

settings.title: Five years warranty
settings.text:
Ergo CORE B625-1: liftable gas
Ergo PRO A633-1: liftable gas
Ergo ART A643: liftable gas

settings.title: Two years warranty
settings.text:
Ergo CORE B625-1: wheels, armrests, headrests, mesh, seat cushion, and foam.
Ergo PRO A633-1: wheels, armrests, headrests, mesh, seat cushion, and foam.
Ergo ART A643: wheels, armrests, headrests, mesh, seat cushion, and foam.
